%%
\pgfsetcolor{dot}
  % Edge: word -> sequence
  \draw [->] (54.028bp,66bp) .. controls (72.946bp,66bp) and (99.658bp,66bp)  .. (135.69bp,66bp);
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw (90bp,84bp) node {$\begin{tabular}{c}analyse\\lexicale\end{tabular}$};
  % Edge: wordX -> sequenceX
  \draw [->] (54.028bp,20bp) .. controls (70.668bp,20bp) and (93.337bp,20bp)  .. (126.23bp,20bp);
  % Edge: sequence -> result
  \draw [->] (280bp,66bp) .. controls (310.86bp,66bp) and (345.72bp,66bp)  .. (381.6bp,66bp);
  \draw (334bp,84bp) node {$\begin{tabular}{c}analyse\\syntaxique\end{tabular}$};
  % Edge: sequenceX -> resultX
  \draw [->] (289.65bp,20bp) .. controls (316.63bp,20bp) and (345.52bp,20bp)  .. (378.17bp,20bp);
  % Node: word
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw [state] (27bp,66bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (27bp,66bp) node {mot};
\end{scope}
  % Node: resultX
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw (409bp,20bp) node {\begin{tikzpicture}[node distance=2cm] \node [state, scale=.3] (foo1) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo1] (foo2) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo1] (foo3) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo3] (foo4) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo3] (foo5) {}; \draw [thick] (foo1) -- (foo2) (foo1) -- (foo3) (foo3) -- (foo4) (foo3) -- (foo5); \end{tikzpicture}};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequence
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw [state] (208bp,66bp) ellipse (72bp and 18bp);
  \draw (208bp,66bp) node {séquence de lexèmes};
\end{scope}
  % Node: result
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw [state,accepting] (409bp,66bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (409bp,66bp) node {AST};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequenceX
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw (208bp,20bp) node {$[[\code{7} \mapsto \dots], [\code{+} \mapsto \dots], [\code{42} \mapsto \dots]]$};
\end{scope}
  % Node: wordX
\begin{scope}
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{dotstroke}
  \draw (27bp,20bp) node {\code{7 + 42}};
\end{scope}
